overview: Space…the final fun-tier. The countdown is on to blast off into the unknown in FUNBOX’s brand new out of this world singalong adventure; SPACE RACE.  Join Anya, Kevin, Gary and Bonzo as part of the crew of the ‘Starship FUNBOX’ as they take a space odyssey across the universe to explore strange new worlds and dimensions on their galaxy-hopping quest to find their keys. Helped along the way by Fluffy and Flossie in mission control. Find out how who lives in the moon? What is the stinkiest planet? Where are the friendliest aliens?  Packed with classics like ‘Apples and Bananas’ and ‘Aiken Drum’, Funbox favourites and brand new songs, SPACE RACE is out of this world singalong fun for all the family.
title: FUNBOX: Space Race
